sentences.sContent: Her face hadn’t altered much over the years.
sentences.sCn: 过了这么多年，她的容貌并没有多大改变。

sentences.sContent: The city centre has altered beyond recognition (=  changed very much  ) .
sentences.sCn: 市中心变得都认不出来了。

sentences.sContent: Nothing can alter the fact that the refugees are our responsibility.
sentences.sCn: 我们有责任帮助难民，这一事实无法改变。

phrases.pCn: n. 密友；个性的另一面；至交

remMethod.val: alter本身就是词根， 意为“改变”

words.tran: （趋于）改变的；变质的；使体质逐渐康复的；有改变体质作用的
为参加短程高速汽车赛而改装的赛车

trans.tranOther: to change, or to make someone or something change
